ValidationRule.description: Salesforce and Web Dev Ticket record types require Project fields if "Project Tracker" is checked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordType.Id = "01230000001R3YkAAK", RecordType.Id = "012a0000001RR3rAAG" ), Project_Tracker__c = TRUE, ISBLANK(TEXT(ROI__c)), ISBLANK(Summary__c), ISBLANK(ETA__c), ISBLANK(Progress__c), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Phase__c, "Closed")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Phase__c, "Canceled")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Project Tracker is checked. The following fields must have a value: ROI, Summary, ETA, and Progress.
